About Me

Dynamic AI Research Engineer with 7+ years of experience developing and implementing cutting-edge machine learning models and deep learning solutions. Specialized in computer vision, 3D reconstruction, and embedded AI systems. Proven track record of enhancing model performance, optimizing AI for resource-constrained environments, and delivering impactful technological solutions across multiple industries.
